response.overview: In a coastal village in the Philippines, a fishing family struggles as climate change affects their way of life, with rising sea levels, unpredictable weather, and fewer fish. Despite these challenges, the mother stays hopeful because they are next in line to inherit a rare, ancient plant passed down through generations. This plant, seen as a good luck charm, represents strength and hope. Families have gathered around it in hard times, finding comfort and believing it gives them protection, shields them from bad luck, and brings prosperity. To keep the plant alive, they must follow certain rules, as their luck depends on the plantâ€™s health.
response.title: Pamanahon
